None.Name: Tainted Thrill
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, tower bolts penetrating arrows that deals 105 damage to enemy units in a 5m radius around its target, up to 157 in total. The damage dealt by this building cannot be warded off with the help of damage reducing abilities because it is able to circumvent every buff or protective shield. Only affects air units.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the building will repair the building and restore its life points.
